original_text: You counted the houses in Jerusalem and you knocked down some of them. You used the stones to make the city's wall stronger.
korean_text: 또 예루살렘의 가옥을 계수하며 그 가옥을 헐어 성벽을 견고하게도 하며

sentences.original_text: You counted the houses in Jerusalem
and you knocked down some of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 그것들 중 일부를 허물었습니다

sentences.original_text: to make the city's wall stronger
sentences.korean_translation: 도시의 성벽을 더 튼튼하게 만들기 위해
